text: Hagen is a city in the Arnsberg Government Region in the Ruhr area in the state of North Rhine-Westphalia in Germany. == Population == It has about 196,000 inhabitants. == Boroughs == Borough Population Oct 2007 Area in kmÂ² Hagen-Mitte 78.952 20,5 Hagen-Nord 38.451 29,6 Hagen-Haspe 30.360 22,2 Hagen-Eilpe/Hagen-Dahl 17.148 51,1 Hagen-Hohenlimburg 31.306 37,0 Some localities of Hagen: * Hagen-Dahl * Hagen-Emst * Hagen-Priorei * Hagen- Rummenohl * Hagen-Halden == References == ==Other websites== Category:Urban districts in Regierungsbezirk Arnsberg
title: Hagen
